explorer.fileNesting.patterns.pubspec.yaml: .flutter-plugins, .packages, .dart_tool, .flutter-plugins-dependencies, .metadata, .packages, pubspec.lock, all_lint_rules.yaml, custom_lint.log, l10n.yaml, ftth_pos.iml, analysis_options.yaml, build.yaml, build.*.yaml, slang.yaml, index_generator.yaml
